name: MEC Purist Cycling Water Bottle 650ml
description: Don't ruin your ride with plastic-tasting water. The Purist Cycling Water Bottle features an incredibly thin (20 nanometers) silicone dioxide coating that resists taste, odour and stains so you get fresh water with every gulp. The WaterGate cap has a leakproof one-way valve so you won't spill a drop, even if you leave the cap open.Soft LDPE body is easy to squeeze and BPA-free.Thin silicone coating prevents staining or tastes to keep your water pure and bottle clean.High-flow Heart Valve is leakproof, even when the valve is open.Fits most standard bottle cages.To clean: shake with soapy water. Do not scrub – this could damage the silicone layer.
